explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses the use of machine learning algorithms for predicting loan default risk.
explanations.supervised learning: The study involves supervised learning techniques as it uses labeled data to predict credit defaults.
explanations.classification: The research focuses on classifying loan applicants into default or non-default categories.
explanations.support vector machine: The paper mentions SVMs (Support Vector Machines) as one of the models used in the comparative analysis.
explanations.SVM: SVM is explicitly mentioned as one of the techniques used for predicting credit defaults.
explanations.decision tree: Decision trees are listed among the machine learning models compared in the study.
explanations.neural network: The multi-layered perceptron, a type of neural network, is mentioned as one of the models used in the research.
